name: Lana Janoff II Galactic Hacker
description:
This game is a submission to Lux Jam II, 72 hours game jam contest.

GitHub: https://github.com/mika314/lj2

Controllers: standard WASD, left mouse button initiates the satellite hacking.

Known issues:

  • the fullscreen setting is buggy; use Alt-Enter instead
  • mouse sensitivity is not getting saved
  • flying across the planet is buggy; sometimes the spaceship flies backward, LOL

List of free assets used to make a game:
